title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.11 - Project completion and acceptance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.11 - Project completion and acceptance

State Regulations
(a) When the corporation makes an initial
determination that the project is considered to be substantially complete, in
whole or in part, the corporation shall give written notice of such fact to the
municipality. (b) After acceptance
of the project in whole or in part by the municipality, the corporation as
agent for the municipality shall continue to maintain responsibility for the
completion of any remaining work and arrange for the final inspection as well
as final payments from the project account. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2002.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
